moves.1. e4: This is my first game playing in gameknot.
moves.4. d4: So I tried to get the centre while my opponent was losing his time.
moves.6. dxe5: Other alternative is 6.Nxe5, then 6... Nxe5 7.dxe5 Nxe4 and 8. Qd4 is very strong.
moves.6... Nxe4 7. Qd5 Nb4: There was no good move, he was already dead.
moves.8. Qxf7#: Checkmate. My first game won in 8 moves.
